clinical_notes: Patient presents with chest pain and shortness of breath. History of hypertension and diabetes mellitus type 2. Previous myocardial infarction in 2019.
Follow-up visit: Blood pressure well controlled on lisinopril. HbA1c shows good glycemic control. Patient reports occasional palpitations.
Family history significant for coronary artery disease in father (age 58) and breast cancer in mother (age 62). No known drug allergies.
